explanation: [0-0] An expanse of gray sand.

[0-7] Two hands appear from the left side and start digging in the sand, first revealing a red and white object. With each dig, more of the object is gradually revealed, and then the object is seen to be a toy with big eyes and a mouth. Then, the hands begin to uncover a second toy buried next to it, which is also a face and wearing a red and blue clown hat. Subsequently, the two hands take both toys out of the sand.

[7-14] The scene then switches to a transparent glass container filled with soapy water, where a person wearing purple clothes can be seen putting the two toys into the soapy water. The camera pulls back to reveal that the soapy water is inside a blender. Then, a right hand turns on the blender switch, and the mouth of the shaking big-eyed toy is moving.
